items.jobDescribe:
Overview of the Job
As part of COE, locating in country site(s) to lead a small team on executing, developing, sustaining and improving Hayco employee training procedures& system& programs, internal communication procedure& system& programs, and, performance management procedure locally, according to Hayco Corporate HR strategies, Employee Communication strategies in support of the Hayco growth and business needs.
 
Main Responsibilities
? Translate and deploy Corporate T&D strategy, Employee communication& engagement strategy to country site level work plans, for developing employees’ skillset and competencies and engagements to enable achieving ongoing and emerging organization needs.
? Oversee and implement all of Hayco internal communications processes by devising ways to share internal management information effectively between our employees.
? Identify current and future training/internal communication needs of the Hayco China Facilities in partnership with cross-functional leadership team, develop individualized and group training and communication programs/solutions that address specific business needs, i.e. Leadership development, technical skill development, multiple skills operator program, town hall, employee engagement survey.. etc.
? Ensure training /communication procedure& system in compliance with customer and quality system requirements and improve its effectiveness, including, effectively manage the budget, develop training execution platform, develop employee communication platform, maintain records, develop internal trainer and training curriculums, develop internal communication materials (such as presentations, newsletters, and announcements…), etc.
? Support talent management and performance management projects and procedure deployments in local country site(s). ? Lead, coach and develop the T&D team and its members.
 
Job Requirement
?College degree or above, in HR, Management, English, Communications, Public Relations or a related field.
? ~10 years in training and development or employee communication discipline ( comes from NMC is a plus), with at least 3 years experience in training and development management and 3 years experience in internal communication management (essential)
? Understand the manufacturing and FMCG market, blended learning methodologies, talent management practices or employee communication management practices(essential)
? Creative mindset, critical thinker with innovative problem solving skills, result oriented (essential)
? Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, fluent English and Mandarin, stand up presentation/facilitation skills (essential)
? Meticulous attention to detail (plus)
? Excellent interpersonal and teamwork skills(plus)
? Highly computer literate with proficiency in MS Office and related business and communication tools (plus)
 
At Hayco, all of our recruiting, hiring, training, promotions, compensation, benefits, transfers, layoffs, and other employment decisions will be made without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, marital status, national origin, race, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability or any other characteristics protected by applicable law or regulation.
The Company prohibits unlawful discrimination. All employment decisions shall be based on the qualifications of the individual applicants or employees as such qualifications relate to the particular job.

5.	态度积极乐观，具有较强的团队合作能力，跨部门沟通能力。

岗位职责：
1、理解业务痛点及业务对人才的能力要求，面向内部员工以及管理层完成培训相关的调研、分析与诊断等工作；
2、依据业务需求设计，开展培训活动，满足员工培训需求，为员工提供专业、效果显著的发展路径和职场成长空间；
3、牵头其他培训例行化工作，如新员工入职培训、人才梯队建设项目等；
4、基于组织发展需求，运营中高层管理者分层分阶培养领导力项目，并深度验证效果；
5、制定和完善员工关系政策，开展促进员工关系融洽、提高工作效率的活动；
6、员工沟通渠道建设，员工关怀，沟通谈话，关注员工思想动态，组织节日团建活动等。
任职要求：
1、本科及以上学历，3年以上相关工作经验，培训、能力发展、人力资源、企业管理、心理学专业背景优先，优秀者可放宽至大专；
2、独立设计实施过至少3个业务培训项目；有内训＋外训经验优先；
3、数据分析和输出报告输出（ ppt word 等形式）能力突出，具备良好的团队合作意识；
4、具备跨境电商行业人才培训经验优先。
公司福利：
1、 薪资结构：基本工资+岗位工资+绩效工资+提成+全勤奖+年终奖+生日红包+五险一金。
2、入职即购买五险一金。
3、在职公司一年以上员工享受5天带薪年假和工龄工资。
4、公司有自动晋级的薪酬体系，只要你够努力够优秀，晋升加薪通道畅通无阻。
5、享***假、婚假、产检假、产假、哺乳假、陪产假等；
6、每周二有下午茶，生日当天会收到来自公司的温馨祝福和红包，一起吃生日蛋糕祝福寿星；
7、每周评选业绩增长***名及业绩***名颁发现金红包；
8、每月举行优秀员工评选，对优秀员工进行现金表彰；
9、公司特色：每月举行''***币''评比，冠军：300元、亚军：200元，季军：100元；
10、依法享有国家民俗节日假期，发放节日礼品等。

上班时间：每天7h，9：00-12：00，14：00-18：00，5.5天，可灵活调休上班，享有全勤，自行加班有加班补贴呦~
公司地址：龙岗区坂田街道禾胜智能园5栋4楼。
公交站：坂田天虹公交站；
地铁站：5号线五和站（D1口）

items.jobName: 索康尼 零售培训经理
items.fullCompanyName: 特步（中国）有限公司
items.jobDescribe:
索康尼（Saucony）成立于1898年，全球四大跑鞋之一，跑鞋中的劳斯莱斯，跑者的头等舱。
我们忠于跑步运动，在跑鞋、服装产品中倾注匠心，并邀请全世界的万千跑者与我们一同奔跑。
Founded in 1898, Saucony is one of the famous-four running shoes in the world, the Rolls-Royce of running shoes and the first class of runners.
We are always loyal to running, focus on running shoes and clothing product, and invites thousands of runners around the world to run with us.

零售培训体系与培训规划
1、通过了解店铺的现状，结合公司业务发展的需求，战略性地规划有效的培训课程；
2、组织培训团队完成培训课件的开发， 定期提供店铺产品、品牌及销售技巧的培训，通过提升店铺员工的销售综合能力拉动业绩KPI以及客户端的零售购物体验；
3、确保培训的有效性且持续性地迭代培训内容；
4、与一线店铺员工建立深度的业务合作伙伴关系能及时给予店铺运营层面的改善意见，包含但不限于培训，成为公司内部的零售专家；
5、优化零售培训团队的人员结构，以提升培训服务的质量；
6、持续产出及提升有关店铺员工能力相关的人员发展项目，打通内部零售培训师的发展通道； 

零售人才梯队建设
1、与HR部门协同，负责终端新进员工初始化定级评估，及全员半年度/年度全员绩效评估与职级评定；
2、始终关注人才梯队建设，不断赋能终端员工技能，发掘和激励绩优，帮助绩差制定绩效改进计划提升绩效表现，
3、组建内训师体系，梳理体系内各项机制，推动内训师团队逐步成为区域管理力量蓄水池
向公司管理层提交终端人才培养状况，并不断提出改进措施。

任职资格：
1、4年以上零售培训工作经验，且必须有营运管理经验；了解终端运营痛点、需求点及提升点；
2、良好的自我驱动力、主人翁精神及工作心态，善于应对各种压力及突发情况，敢于尝试和创新；
3、具备独立开发课程以及熟练操作办公软件的能力；
4、以结果为导向，培训反馈能为销售结果负责。

一、工作职责
负责集团人才开发、培训管理等工作，协助开展人才盘点、人才库管理等工作，包括但不限于以下内容：
1、参与制定集团人力资源战略规划，负责起草集团人才发展专项规划，并组织推进实施。
2、负责制定集团培训体系、规章制度、管理流程和工作机制，并监督检查执行情况。
3、负责集团在线学习平台的建设、运行和日常管理。
4、参与集团关键岗位人才的胜任力模型建设、人才梯队建设，制定继任计划，人才选拔培养和调配方案等；

5、结合人才盘点情况，制定人才开发计划，组织干部人才职业生涯规划、挂职锻炼、导师培养等工作。
6、组织实施相关培训项目，开展培训需求调研，监控培训过程，评估培训效果，开展培训考核；
7、负责开发相关培训课程，尤其对企业文化、校招生、新员工入职培训基本课程有独立开发及讲授能力；
8、负责拓展培训渠道和资源，评估外部培训机构及师资，保证与外部机构的良好合作关系，组织开发集团内部培训课程，建立内部培训师队伍；
9、完成领导交办的其他工作任务。

1、中共党员。
2、大学本科及以上学历，学士及以上学位。
3、8年以上大型企业集团人力资源管理工作经验，5年以上人才开发、培训管理工作经验。
4、熟悉国家和地方劳动法规和政策，掌握人力资源管理、组织管理等等专业知识，具有较强的办公自动化技能。
5、优秀的团队领导及沟通协调能力，较强的抗压能力和文字表达能力，工作责任心强，具有亲和力。
6、具有运维集团型企业在线学习系统经验的人选优先。

items.jobDescribe:
Position Focus岗位主要定位
The Talent Management Manager plays a critical role in the transformational and is responsible for centralizing the talent acquisition function and building the Talent Development framework. This role is a valued member of the Human Resources Team and will develop and execute a talent management strategy for the entire Market according to different target population. 
The Talent Manager leads the end-to-end talent acquisition team, including Strategic Sourcing, Contracts, Employee Reference Check, and On-boarding. This role is a key influencer and will work closely with senior stakeholders to promote the employee Branding and build up the campus recruitment.
Management Scope岗位负责范围:
The role cover Talent Management, Talent Acquisition, Employer Branding and Engagement.
The role will lead field recruitment and the development strategy for all Amplifon employees. You will partner with the China GM, Function Heads and Head of HR to develop both internal and external strategies and practices to enable us to attract, develop and retain the highest calibers of employees for our business. 
Job Description岗位职责：
Talent Management (50%)
？	Facilitate the Talent Pool across the Organization and to ensure an effective pipeline of local talents to meet business needs. 
？	Track and follow up closely on Talent Review Action plans (i.e stretch assignment, coaching, mentorship, training, etc) to build a strong pipeline for the China team and to lead and facilitate performance conversations to ensure individuals identified for development are progressing per planned. 
？	Play a leading role in talent management and succession planning activities. Develop solutions to build talent pipelines (internally and externally) and mechanisms to execute on talent and succession activity.
？	Ensure that there are clear links between acquisition of new talent and succession planning processes to grow identified capability, and to ensure retention of talent and continuity of business-critical activity.
Talent Acquisition: (35%)
？	Develop and implement a field talent acquisition strategy that is aligned with the Amplifon Group workforce strategy and brand positioning.
？	Establish standard field recruitment policies and procedures and drive the implementation with KPI matrix. 
？	Start to develop and study the potential service model for the field talent acquisition team that is aligned to the Amplifon Group capability requirements and supported by best practice capability across people, process, and technology. Ensure that the model is supported by a clearly articulated service catalogue with defined measures of success.
？	Source and develop collaborative partnerships with head-hunters, recruitment firms, external institutes, business school and universities to develop an external pipeline of field talents.
？	Build the capability of the talent acquisition team by introducing customer driven, relevant technology solutions and processes to support end-to-end strategic sourcing activity, and to deliver a high-quality candidate experience.
？	Lead the delivery of a seamless on-boarding experience that is aligned to other on-boarding and induction related activities.
？	Build a high performing and customer centric culture within the talent acquisition function to drive improved outcomes within the area of accountability, including ensuring effective use of Performance and Career Plans that encompass clear objectives and performance standards to support the delivery of strategic and operational objectives.
Employer Branding / Engagement (15%)
？	Develop a clearly articulated Employee Value Proposition (EVP) that positions Amplifon Group as an employer of choice, and that is communicated through a range of innovative channels to promote personalization, relevancy, and advocacy. Use data and benchmarking to measure success.
？	Ensure that the talent team plays a leadership role in proactive sourcing and delivering on the objectives articulated in the Diversity and Inclusion.
Qualifications任职资格/要求：
？	Fluent in Chinese and English, know about Chinese culture.
？	Relevant qualifications in Human Resources around 8+ years’ experience and supported by relevant experience in HRBP and Talent Acquisition roles. 
？	Thrive in a fast-paced ecosystem where strong conceptual and problem-solving skills are required. Extensive use of analytical skills, data-based decisions, KPIs definition and management are already today your daily activities.
？	Believe that each person has unique talents and organizations can help to have these traits emerging and having a positive impact.
